ResearchProjectDef.label: crude bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create crude bionics at the machining table that work slightly better than biological body parts. They require common materials to build, like steel and industrial era components. Crude bionics irritate the skin and are not hygienic in the slightest.

ResearchProjectDef.label: integrated weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create blades, bludgeons, ranged weapon platforms, and other weaponry at the machining table that can be attached directly to your pawns. Why use traditional weapons when your body is a killing machine?
